title: Chest Aquisition
body: Now, i grant you that i have not searched throughout the entire client, however i cannot find anywhere that says how many chests/ which champions you are still able to earn chests with on either the profile page or the collection page. Now, i am not the most observant person in the world but as riot is pushing the crafting system, it might be nice to know where these options are or if they have been forgotten in the new client.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=aWWIcfrF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T01:52:03.511+0000)
>
> next patch, in profile

Thank you!

Will you be making it so that we're able to see which champs we have earned/not earned chests for (via a border) in champ select?
I've earned on over 30 champs this season and it's difficult to remember which champs I haven't earned on in champ select when you're trying to think of counter picks and bans.

I swear my last 1 of 4 "boxes available for unlock" disappeared either from a client or new season change bug today. I track my hextech unlocks very closely... Not a big deal to me though as I can't catch up with the keys.
I believe this has not been implemented.
